--- title: 3 publications using GAP in the category "Harmonic analysis on Euclidean spaces" layout: default ---

[DHS10] Duncan, D. M., Hoffman, T. R., and Solazzo, J. P., Equiangular tight frames and fourth root Seidel matrices, Linear Algebra Appl., 432 (11) (2010), 2816–2823.

[HS12] Hoffman, T. R. and Solazzo, J. P., Complex equiangular tight frames and erasures, Linear Algebra Appl., 437 (2) (2012), 549–558.

[PM03] Püschel, M. and Moura, J. M. F., The algebraic approach to the discrete cosine and sine transforms and their fast algorithms, SIAM J. Comput., 32 (5) (2003), 1280–1316.
